name: Tick Hero
description:
Known bugs:

  • Starting a game after playing (the tutorial) doesn’t work properly.
  • Sometimes too many cards dissappear from your deck.

Within the world of ticks, you find yourself at the gate of this big dungeon. When you move in with all your courage you find that the monsters in this dungeon act on the same ticks as you do.  You know you only got one shot at driving the monster back deeper into the dungeon to defend the world of ticks from this evil.

Tick hero is a hand/deck builder game where every 10 ticks you will lose your most left card in hand while also having to choose a new one that gets added to the right of your hand. Four out of five cards can be used before you gain a new hand.

This game was made for the Ludum dare 51 game jam.
